name: 新一轮 (Live)
lyric:
译：陈粒
音乐总监：荒井十一
制作人：荒井十一
编曲：冯翰铭/苏道哲
计算机编程：冯翰铭/苏道哲
鼓：荒井十一
钢琴 / 键盘：冯翰铭
吉他：顾忠山
贝斯：Damien Banzigou
大提琴：宋昭
音响设计：王凯
现场录音：王雷 / 赛汉
音乐编辑：倪涵文 / 李卓 / 李宗远 / 茆博文 / 荒井十一
混音：周天澈
母带处理：Joe LaPorta

Oh see you break your back and blend in what you want
A puppet on the strings drags himself into another run
Turning and returning to the ghost town

What're you hiding from
Haunted by the notion make a motion
Come and get things done

Things done
Oh see you preen your feathers and blend in what you want
A puppet on the strings' reminding himself not to bloom

Turning and returning to the ghost town
What're you hiding from
Haunted by the notion make a motion

Come and get things done
Get things done
Oh get things done

Oh see you break your back and blend in what you want
A puppet on the strings drags himself into another run

Turning and returning to the ghost town
What're you hiding from
Haunted by the notion make a motion
Come and get things done
Get things done

Oh see you break your back and blend in what you want
A puppet on the strings drags himself into another run

Turning and returning to the ghost town
What're you hiding from
Haunted by the notion make a motion

Come and get things done
Get things done
Get things done
Get things done
